event.title: Software Freedom Day and Fellowship Meeting Franken/Franconia in Bamberg, Germany
event.body: On Saturday, September 19, 2015, from 10:00 am to 5:30 pm, the local FSFE group in Franconia will have a booth at Maxplatz, Bamberg for the Software Freedom Day. Afterwards (starting at approximately 6:30 pm), we will have a shorter Fellowship meeting at the local Hackerspace. All friends of Free Software are invited to come!
